item.title: How to connect to JIIT Study Material
item.description: I recently received a call from my room mate. He asked me about how he could access the “Study Material” shared folder from our college, mentioning that the college had sent us a file with directions for setting it up, (which I was blissfully unaware of, honestly I couldn’t care less about the classes starting right now :/) Well, upon opening the file I did find some instructions, BUT they are only for windows.
